# Wine to Blood
## Overview
***The following spell is available to [[Ahooling|ahooling]] spellcasters at the GM’s discretion.***

**Level**: 1st
#Spell-Level/1st

**School**: Transmutation
#Spell-School/Transmutation

**Casting Time**: 1 action

**Range**: 30 feet

**Components**: V, S, M (bottle of wine)

**Duration**: instantaneous

## Effects
This spell takes any non-magical inert liquid and changes it into blood. It doesn’t taste very good, but provides the nutrients necessary for an [[Ahooling|ahooling]] or [[Ahool|ahool]] to survive.
